name: Gnop Gnop
description:
Description

Gnop Gnop is a 3D reboot of the classic game Pong. Along with the added dimension comes power shots, and multiple gameplay modifiers which adds a new element of strategy.

Play single player against the CPU, Head-to-Head against a friend in split screen mode, or hone your skills with Infinite Gameplay Mode.
